title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Nominate and Appoint the Following Individuals to Key Administration Posts – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
January 28, 2020
Beth Harwell of Tennessee, to be a Member of the Tennessee Valley Authority.Brian Noland of Tennessee, to be a Member of the Tennessee Valley Authority.Mendel Goldstein of California, to be a Member of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.Curtis Darrow Robinson of Connecticut, to be a Member of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.Sigal Mandelker of New York, to be a Member of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council. Hock E. Tan of California, to be a Member of the President’s National Security and Telecommunications Advisory Committee.Brian J. Truskowski of Connecticut, to be a Member of the President’s National Security and Telecommunications Advisory Committee.Theresa Mayer of Indiana, to be a Member of the President’s Council of Advisors on Science and Technology.Hussein Tawbi of Texas, to be a Member of the President’s Council of Advisors on Science and Technology.Harry C. Erwin III of Arkansas, to be a Member of the President’s Advisory Committee on the Arts of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.Kevin Robl of California, to be a Member of the President’s Advisory Committee on the Arts of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.Albert Riley James of Missouri, to be a Member of the Mississippi River Commission.
